question: The first-ever Indo-US tri-services 'Tiger Triumph' has started in which state?
explanation: The 9-day humanitarian assistance and disaster relief (HADR) exercise code-named \'Tiger Triumph\' has been started between armed forces of India and United States on the Eastern seaboard (at Visakhapatnam and Kakinada in Andhra Pradesh). The aim of the first-ever tri-services exercise is to develop inter-operability between the militaries of the two countries in HADR operations.
